import React from 'react'; import TotalDisplay from './components/TotalDisplay'; import CalcButton from './components/CalcButton'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import { initialState } from './reducers'; import reducer from './reducers'; function App() { const [state,dispatch]=useReducer(reducer,initialState); return (
Reducer Challenge
Operation: {state.operation} Memory: {state.memory}
); } export default App;
